org.digijava.kernel.util

Class SiteConfigUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.util.SiteConfigUtils

  • public class SiteConfigUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class, which provides some useful methods to simplify access to site configuration

        public static java.lang.String buildDgURL(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                          boolean relative)
        Deprecated. don't use this method. There are better alternatives to construct URLs in SiteUtils class
        Generate Url relative or non relative url
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        relative - boolean
        Returns:
        builded URL

      • buildDgURL

        public static java.lang.String buildDgURL(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                          SiteDomain siteDomain,
                                          boolean relative)
        Deprecated. don't use this method. There are better alternatives to construct URLs in SiteUtils class
        Generate Url, relative or non relative. If non-relative, then URL has form //. If relative - (without /)
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        siteDomain - site domain for which URL must be calculated
        relative - boolean relative or not
        Returns:
        Url, relative or non relative

      • getCurrentModuleURL

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentModuleURL(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Deprecated. for most cases RequestUtils.getFullModuleUrl() is what you may need
        Get current module name with instance for example: /news/sport
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        current module/instance path
